channel.title: Dai, Yutong / 戴宇童
channel.description: Recent content on Dai, Yutong / 戴宇童

item.title: A Subspace Acceleration Method for Minimization Involving a Group Sparsity-Inducing Regularizer
Synchronous Parallel Block Coordinate Descent Method for Nonsmooth Convex Function Minimization

item.description: Yutong is a Ph.D. student in the Department of Industrial and Systems Engineering at Lehigh University, working under the supervision of Professor Daniel P. Robinson. His current research focus on designing and analyzing algorithms for large scale convex non-smooth optimization problems arisen in machine learning.
